sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.NotifySMSPreferences</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Implements extension point sn_sms_pref.SMSPreferences</description>
        <name>NotifySMSPreferences</name>
        <script><![CDATA[/*
 * @typedef {Array<{
					 value: string,
					 label: string
			}>} PreferenceData
 */
var NotifySMSPreferences = Class.create();
NotifySMSPreferences.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },

	PLUGIN_TWILIO_LEGACY_DRIVER: "com.snc.notify.twilio",

    /*
	 * @returns {ProviderData}
	 */
	getProviders: function() {
		var providerNames = new NotifyUtilSNC().getTelephonyProviders();
		var providers = [], prov;
		for (var i = 0; i < providerNames.length; i++) {
			prov = {};
			prov.value = prov.label = providerNames[i];
			providers.push(prov);
		}
		// For legacy Twilio driver, add an entry
		if (GlidePluginManager.isActive(this.PLUGIN_TWILIO_LEGACY_DRIVER)) {
			prov = {};
			prov.label = "Twilio (Legacy)";
			prov.value = "Twilio";
			providers.push(prov);
		}
		return providers;
	},

	type: 'NotifySMSPreferences'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2019-02-12 05:54:19</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>05695d8e0b6323008401818393673a95</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>NotifySMSPreferences</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Notify" source="com.snc.notify">f0dfd45447320210cd4e1ce4316d4394</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_05695d8e0b6323008401818393673a95</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>chandrika.gonuguntla</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2019-04-22 09:26:36</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
